hudson.plugins.validating__string__param.name: tag_name
hudson.plugins.validating__string__param.description: The tag and associated commit that will be imported into the region. If no tag is specified then the most recent commit will be imported.

hudson.plugins.validating__string__param.name: git_repo_location
hudson.plugins.validating__string__param.description: The location of the git repo including hostname and .git file location
hudson.plugins.validating__string__param.failedValidationMessage: You must enter a location of the git repo to commit to

org.jvnet.hudson.plugins.SSHBuilder.command:
set -ex
BUILDDIR=$(mktemp -d --suffix=".CFME") LIFECYCLE_TAG=QA
cd ${BUILDDIR} git clone $git_repo_location ${BUILDDIR} git checkout $tag_name .
git status
cd automate/ git archive --format=zip -o ../automate.zip $tag_name .
cd /var/www/miq/vmdb
bin/rake rhconsulting:dialogs:import[${BUILDDIR}/dialogs] bin/rake rhconsulting:service_catalogs:import[${BUILDDIR}/service_catalogs] bin/rake rhconsulting:roles:import[${BUILDDIR}/roles.yml] bin/rake rhconsulting:tags:import[${BUILDDIR}/tags.yml] bin/rake rhconsulting:buttons:import[${BUILDDIR}/buttons.yml] bin/rake rhconsulting:customization_templates:import[${BUILDDIR}/customization_templates.yml] bin/rake evm:automate:restore BACKUP_ZIP_FILE=${BUILDDIR}/automate.zip #bin/rake "rhconsulting:miq_ae_datastore:import[Customer, ${BUILDDIR}/miq_ae_datastore]"
cd ${BUILDDIR}
git tag -d $LIFECYCLE_TAG && git push origin :refs/tags/$LIFECYCLE_TAG || true git tag $LIFECYCLE_TAG $tag_name git push origin master --tags
if [ -n "$BUILDDIR" ] then echo "Cleaning up temp directory that was created" rm -rf $BUILDDIR fi
